title: Scaling of client windows question
body: What i mean is if you re-scale the client to be bigger/smaller would the store or profile etc scale with it instead of it staying the same size but having scroll bars on the bottom and side. Wondering if that's going to be a thing or not.

replies.body: Yes, its a fixed size. The assets do scale if you are using a high resolution screen.
It's a fixed resolution for now, but that wil change later. At the moment, stability is the most important thing.
